description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the update distribution method issue for KB-5034441:

1. Refer to the updated KB article that clarifies the change in distribution methods for Windows updates. 
2. Update your deployment strategies to accommodate the removal of WSUS as a distribution option. 

**Details**:
This alteration may affect how updates are distributed for Windows 10 versions 21H2 and 22H2. Ensure that your environment is set up to retrieve updates from alternate channels as needed. (LLM Synthesized)
